summary: This script demonstrates how to prepare a tokenizer and train a hybrid RNNT‑CTC speech‑to‑text model using NeMo, supporting BPE or word‑piece tokenization and configurable training parameters via Hydra.
business_intent: Enable users to quickly set up, train, and fine‑tune a state‑of‑the‑art ASR model for speech recognition applications, leveraging configurable tokenizers and experiment tracking.
